TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
You aren't killing him? Okay....

Just typical British weather here.
It's a bit chilly, which is quite lovely.

Oh praise the god-Empress, another girl!

@Rage - You're in Texas? Cool.

@ Leon - Since he claims to have not meant it in the way I'm interpreting it, I'll refrain. This time.

You aren't killing him? Okay....

Just typical British weather here.

*fiddles with thumbs* That's more than can be said for you...

@Trekkette: Howdy.

I'll just post the NOAA info:

Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. Southwest wind 5 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

*Bounds Rage097 and places him into a Tsar Bomba*

How do you know which is a girl Trekkette?

I'll just post the NOAA info:

Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. Southwest wind 5 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

EDIT: I be in the northeast US.

Edited May 30, 2013 by Flymetothemun

@ leon: Again?!

How do I even fit in one!?

*Bounds Rage097 and places him into a Tsar Bomba*

How do you know which is a girl Trekkette?

-female avi

-female user title

-has previously claimed to be female

At that point, I'd have taken A G.I.R.L., though...

@ Leon - Since he claims to have not meant it in the way I'm interpreting it, I'll refrain. This time.

Perhaps he only means it that way now that you know about it and fears your response?

We compress you up very small and remove some parts. The resultant blast isn't as powerful but is still massive.

Edit: What about the rest of us? Why do you presume our genders? Also, TvTropes!

*Bounds Rage097 and places him into a Tsar Bomba*

How do you know which is a girl Trekkette?

We have a sixth sense for this sorta thing.

As for weather, *takes off a bloodied set of Samurai Ã…Å’-yoroi* Blood with a a chance of dead skunk *starts cleaning her Yari*

EDIT: I be in the northeast US. The state between NY and WV.

Stop sharing your weather with me!

I'm in Upstate NY, all the storms from northwest PA slam into my place.

At the moment it's warm but humid, with intermittent downpours and a chance of thunder.
I really hope you didn't get any skunk spray on you, Chobit...
And yet you have claimed before to be disgusted by our violence Chobit...
Meanwhile in the Tsar Bomba
As a matter of fact, all women online have a secret way of detecting all other online women. It's very advanced and you men wouldn't understand it.

As a matter of fact, all women online have a secret way of detecting all other online women. It's very advanced and you men wouldn't understand it.

Electronically communicated pheromones?
Your primitive theory amuses me.

And yet you have claimed before to be disgusted by our violence Chobit...

You hunt vermin with a rifle, I hunt with folded-steel blades

Your primitive theory amuses me.

Mental link to all other women in the universe?

Violence is still violence, no matter how you present it.

You hunt vermin with a rifle, I hunt with folded-steel blades

An elegant weapon, for a more civilized age...

also - kill da wabbit! kill da wabbit!

WTH, Chrome? Da is not a word, but wabbit is??

Chobit, I have this:

*throws it at LeonG7*

Get him please?

An elegant weapon, for a more civilized age...

also - kill da wabbit! kill da wabbit!

WTH, Chrome? Da is not a word, but wabbit is??

http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=wabbit

More violence, yet again...
BLECH! Give Trekkette the dark chocolate, I can't stand that ****
How 'bout this?
